description: A Science and Science Fiction writer - I recently discovered the latest and most profound scientific discovery in history - The God Particle or Higgs boson - and created the God Particle Bible from that amazing information about how the universe works. The research for this book led me to realize that the God Particle Field is really The Force in Star Wars - so my newest book - "The Force Equation - Unleash the Power" spells out how the greatest riddles of the universe are now solved and how anyone can really become as powerful as the Jedi Knight in Star Wars but of course without all the hocus pocus and movie magic. This course is a deep dive into the details of the Force - how it was discovered - where anyone can find it - how anyone can use it to join the Real Rebel Alliance and defeat the real Empire.
title: Star Force Wars - The Force Awakens Inside You!
